thread.title: Shahid Kapoor’s Statement About Kangana Ranaut Should End Their War
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor’s Statement About Kangana Ranaut Should End Their War

author: Priyam Saha
title: Shahid Kapoor’s Statement About Kangana Ranaut Should End Their War
text:
Priyam Saha Feb . 23 . 2017 Shahid Kapoor and Kangana Ranaut in Tippa from Rangoon 
Shahid Kapoor and Kangana Ranaut ‘s cold war has been tabloid gossip for a while now. These Rangoon co-stars have famously not gotten along during the film’s shoot and during their promotional rounds too, there have been a lot of comment-wars between the both of them. 
Looks like Shahid has decided to end their war when he was asked to comment on something Kangana said about him: 
I would not like to play a table tennis match on this whole episode by answering to each of her comments. I just wish to put an end to this match. Kangana should move ahead with all her co-stars in an amicable manner and work with a team spirit. 
There you have it!
